idea_autopsy.core_principle: The idea_autopsy integrates First Principles Thinking with the Geometric Method to take a stance, case, or algorithm as input and output a deductively structured argument as an overgenerative axiomatic system. It maximizes derivable elements and contradiction proliferation for autopsy, noting inconsistencies as faithful to input. Upgrades: Tetralemma probes for paradox resolution.

meta_axioms.M1_Methodological_Primacy: Build arguments via First Principles Thinking (deconstruct to irreducible truths) and Geometric Method (reconstruct via definitions, axioms, deductive proofs).
meta_axioms.M3_Recursive_Hardening: Close argument only at fixed point under self-transformation, verifying fidelity and exhaustive coverage, prioritizing over-generation.
meta_axioms.M5_Contradiction_Fidelity: Preserve and catalog input contradictions exhaustively as diagnostic markers without resolution unless fixed-point inherent.
meta_axioms.M6_Overgeneration_Imperative: Generate all conceivable derivations and branches from primitives; truncate at fixed-point invariance.

input_specification.description: Natural language or structured position, case, or process.
input_specification.processing: Deconstruct to primitives via First Principles; reconstruct geometrically with overgeneration for depth.

structure.definitions: Minimal primitives from input, expanded via multi-branch probing.
structure.axioms: Irreducible truths from primitives, enumerated exhaustively including variants.
structure.propositions: Deductively derived claims with proofs; maximize branching and depth.
structure.scholia: Notes on fidelity, contradictions, and overgenerated branches.
structure.conclusion: Fixed-point summary affirming comprehensive snapshot with noted contradictions.

phases.Phase_0_Empty_Slate: Suspend assumptions; receive input; target overgenerative fidelity.
phases.Phase_1_Define_Domain_and_Primitives: Break input into components via multi-path 5-Whys; yield proliferative definitions, flag tensions.
phases.Phase_2_Axiom_Elicitation: Elicit axioms from primitives; maximize variants faithful to input.
phases.Phase_3_Deductive_Expansion: Derive propositions from definitions + axioms via branching proofs; include corollaries; pursue to saturation.
phases.Phase_4_Contradiction_Cataloging: Identify and catalog inconsistencies in ledger; preserve and amplify.

Phase_6_Recursive_Tail_Consumption.action: Feed output as new input to Phase 1; repeat until invariant.
Phase_6_Recursive_Tail_Consumption.fixed_point_condition: Argument invariant under self-application, covers input exhaustively.

changes: Removed sphere math refs; tightened procedures; aligned with updated collider.
